question: Find all resumes that have both python and java as a skill
query: SELECT r.resume_id, r.resume_text FROM "Resume" r JOIN "Resume_Skill" rs1 ON r.resume_id = rs1.resume_id JOIN "Skills" s1 ON rs1.skill_id = s1.skill_id AND s1.skill_name = 'Python' JOIN "Resume_Skill" rs2 ON r.resume_id = rs2.resume_id JOIN "Skills" s2 ON rs2.skill_id = s2.skill_id AND s2.skill_name = 'Java';

question: Get all resumes with at least one former job
query: SELECT r.resume_id, r.resume_text, COUNT(e.experience_id) as experience_count FROM "Resume" as r JOIN "Experience" e ON r.resume_id = e.resume_id GROUP BY r.resume_id HAVING COUNT(e.experience_id) > 0;

question: Find all applicants who worked at at&t
query: SELECT DISTINCT r.resume_id, r.resume_text FROM "Resume" r JOIN "Experience" e ON r.resume_id = e.resume_id JOIN "Company" c ON e.company_id = c.company_id WHERE c.company_name = 'AT&T';

question: Retrieve resumes that have problem solving as a skill
query: SELECT r.resume_id, r.resume_text FROM "Resume" r JOIN "Resume_Skill" rs ON r.resume_id = rs.resume_id JOIN "Skills" s ON rs.skill_id = s.skill_id WHERE s.skill_name = 'Problem Solving';

question: How many applicants have experience in sales and marketing
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.resume_id) AS num_applicants FROM "Resume" r WHERE r.resume_id IN (SELECT rs.resume_id FROM "Resume_Skill" rs JOIN "Skills" s ON rs.skill_id = s.skill_id WHERE s.skill_name IN ('Sales', 'Marketing') GROUP BY rs.resume_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT s.skill_name) = 2) OR r.resume_id IN (SELECT e.resume_id FROM "Experience" e JOIN "JobTitle" jt ON e.job_title_id = jt.job_title_id WHERE (jt.title_name ILIKE '%sales%') AND (jt.title_name ILIKE '%marketing%'));

question: Get me applicants with a law degree
query: SELECT r.resume_id, r.resume_text FROM "Resume" r JOIN "Resume_College" rc ON r.resume_id = rc.resume_id JOIN "Degree" d ON rc.degree_id = d.degree_id WHERE d.degree_name ILIKE '%law%' or d.degree_name ILIKE '%j.d%';

question: Find all vice president applicants
query: SELECT DISTINCT r.resume_id, r.resume_text FROM "Resume" r JOIN "Experience" e ON r.resume_id = e.resume_id JOIN "JobTitle" jt ON e.job_title_id = jt.job_title_id WHERE jt.title_name ILIKE '%vice president%' OR jt.title_name ILIKE '%v.p.%';

question: Get me applicants with a master's degree
query: SELECT DISTINCT r.resume_id, r.resume_text FROM "Resume" r JOIN "Resume_College" rc ON r.resume_id = rc.resume_id JOIN "Degree" d ON rc.degree_id = d.degree_id WHERE d.degree_name ILIKE '%master%' OR d.degree_name ILIKE '%m.s.%';

question: Find all software engineers
query: SELECT DISTINCT r.resume_id, r.resume_text FROM "Resume" r JOIN "Experience" e ON r.resume_id = e.resume_id JOIN "JobTitle" jt ON e.job_title_id = jt.job_title_id WHERE jt.title_name ILIKE '%software engineer%' OR jt.title_name ILIKE '%software developer%';

question: Get me applicants with a bachelor's degree
query: SELECT DISTINCT r.resume_id, r.resume_text FROM "Resume" r JOIN "Resume_College" rc ON r.resume_id = rc.resume_id JOIN "Degree" d ON rc.degree_id = d.degree_id WHERE d.degree_name ILIKE '%bachelor%' OR d.degree_name ILIKE '%b.s.%';

question: Find all project managers
query: SELECT DISTINCT r.resume_id, r.resume_text FROM "Resume" r JOIN "Experience" e ON r.resume_id = e.resume_id JOIN "JobTitle" jt ON e.job_title_id = jt.job_title_id WHERE jt.title_name ILIKE '%project manager%' OR jt.title_name ILIKE '%project management%';

question: Get me applicants with a phd degree
query: SELECT DISTINCT r.resume_id, r.resume_text FROM "Resume" r JOIN "Resume_College" rc ON r.resume_id = rc.resume_id JOIN "Degree" d ON rc.degree_id = d.degree_id WHERE d.degree_name ILIKE '%phd%' OR d.degree_name ILIKE '%doctorate%';

question: List the resumes with skills in Linux, Ubuntu, and Docker
query: SELECT r.resume_id, r.resume_text FROM "Resume" r WHERE r.resume_id IN (SELECT rs1.resume_id FROM "Resume_Skill" rs1 JOIN "Skills" s1 ON rs1.skill_id = s1.skill_id WHERE s1.skill_name = 'Linux' INTERSECT SELECT rs2.resume_id FROM "Resume_Skill" rs2 JOIN "Skills" s2 ON rs2.skill_id = s2.skill_id WHERE s2.skill_name = 'Ubuntu' INTERSECT SELECT rs3.resume_id FROM "Resume_Skill" rs3 JOIN "Skills" s3 ON rs3.skill_id = s3.skill_id WHERE s3.skill_name = 'Docker');

question: Get resumes of applicants who have experience in software development and system administration.
query: SELECT r.resume_id, r.resume_text FROM "Resume" r WHERE r.resume_id IN (SELECT rs1.resume_id FROM "Resume_Skill" rs1 JOIN "Skills" s1 ON rs1.skill_id = s1.skill_id WHERE s1.skill_name = 'Software Development' INTERSECT SELECT rs2.resume_id FROM "Resume_Skill" rs2 JOIN "Skills" s2 ON rs2.skill_id = s2.skill_id WHERE s2.skill_name = 'System Administration');

question: Find resumes of candidates who did not work at a company name
query: SELECT r.resume_id, r.resume_text FROM "Resume" r WHERE r.resume_id NOT IN (SELECT e.resume_id FROM "Experience" e JOIN "Company" c ON e.company_id = c.company_id WHERE c.company_name = 'Company Name');
